code: export var required=function required(value){if(value)return undefined;return"Field is required";};export var maxLengthCreator=function maxLengthCreator(maxLength){return function(value){if(value.length>maxLength)return"Max symbols was reached";return undefined;};};export var numberRequired=function numberRequired(value){return value&&isNaN(Number(value))?'Must be a number':undefined;};
